Quick search

Documentation of PrePostPy¶

PrePostPy provides a high-level scripting interface for Pre- and Post-processing of input and post files of MSC.Marc Mentat® written in Py-thon. It is NOT meant as a feature-complete replacement of the original modules py_mentat and py_post, but rather as a high-level extension built on top of py_mentat and py_post.

Schema of PrePostPy

Disclaimer: I (the author of PrePostPy) developed PrePostPy in my own (spare) free time. This module is built on top of the python modules py_mentat and py_post, which come pre-bundled with the software package MSC.Marc Mentat®. MSC, Marc and Mentat are trademarks or registered trademarks of MSC Software Corporation or its subsidiaries in the United States and/or other countries. The author of PrePostPy has absolutely no relation to MSC Software Corporation.
